subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin and Jordan Staal each scored goals, and Sidney Crosby had a pair of assists that sparked the Penguins to a 4-2 victory against the Flyers on Tuesday.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin and Jordan Staal each scored goals, and Sidney Crosby had a pair of assists that sparked the Penguins to a 4-2 victory against the Flyers on Tuesday.
